reward-details.title: REWARD DETAILS
words: To be qualified for the Lucky Draw Pool (details below) users must 1) connect a wallet to this airdrop page 2) complete a swap with a value of at least $20 on Raydium 3) trade at least $20 worth of RAY on OKEx during the event period, and 4) provide a valid OKEx User ID. Qualified users will receive a minimum of 5 points for the Lucky Draw Pool and a chance to receive an airdrop of up to $1,000 in RAY tokens.

The first 4,000 users to connect a wallet, swap, and successfully refer at least 1 user, who is qualified based on the definition in detail 1, are guaranteed to win $10 in RAY tokens each. Users in the first 4,000 to complete these steps will also be eligible for the Lucky Draw Pool for a chance at up to $1,000 in RAY tokens.
Qualified users can earn extra points for the Lucky Draw Pool by completing bonus tasks; 1) Following Raydium on Twitter and 2) successfully referring new users, worth 1 point each.
The top 5 finishers on the referral leaderboard will win $2,000 in RAY tokens each. Referrals count as extra points for the lucky draw pool.

Prizes for the lucky draw will be issued in descending order (ie: 3 winners of $1,000, 15 winners of $300, 100 winners of $100, 250 winners of $50, and 1,000 winners of $20). Winners are ineligible to win multiple prizes from the lucky draw pool.

requirements: to Swap on Raydium, Trade on OKEx, & Successfully Refer at least 1 Friend
Swap on Raydium, Trade on OKEx & Provide Valid OKEx User ID (Worth 5 Entries)
R2.eligibility: All users who complete a swap and provide a valid OKEx Login are eligible

terms-conditions.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
words: Users that qualify for a guaranteed airdrop of the equivalent of $10 in RAY tokens are also eligible for the Lucky Draw Pool detailed above. However, participants will not be able to win multiple lucky draws.
Users will need to verify their completion of tasks via the Raydium Airdrop Page in order to qualify for the lucky draw. Lucky draw winners will be selected at random by Raydium.
Raydium reserves the right to cancel or amend any Activity Rules at our sole discretion, as well as the final interpretation of user task completion.
Rewards will be distributed to eligible participants via the wallet address linked to the account they used to swap.
The airdrop campaign will ends on 2021-12-24 10:00:00 UTC. All tasks must be completed before this time.

eligible.title: Eligible for Lucky Draw?
eligible.tips: Qualified users are defined as having connected a wallet, completed a swap, made a trade on OKEx and submitted a valid OKEx UID. Current results are pending OKEx confirmation.

point.title: Points for Lucky Draw
point.tips: 1 point = 1 entry. Prizes for the lucky draw will be issued in descending order (ie: 3 winners of $1,000, 15 winners of $300, 100 winners of $100, etc). Winners are ineligible to win multiple prizes from the lucky draw pool.

qualified.title: Qualified Referrals
qualified.tips: Referral points are earned from users who used your code to connect a wallet, complete a swap, trade on OKEx, and submit a valid OKEx UID. Current referrals are pending OKEx confirmation.
